description:
Setup requires reading the instructions for frontend and backend configuration -- a bit daunting but enables very powerful/flexible features.

Can extract metadata from OTA program info and record based on keywords.
Doesn't work and messed up my computer royally. And I'm having problems removing it.
Using on a second computer connected to a master backend.
I guess the bad reviews are from people who don't know how to set up MythTV. It is a technical PITA, but once it's been configured, it works great.

"Your database schema is 11 revisions behind".

MythTV really needs to solve its toxic schema problem. I shouldn't have to update my entire system - which spans machines all over the house - just because one client is on an OS that has a later schema.

I've used this system for over a decade, and the hassle with schema has been the one constant - it never, ever, ever gets any better.

How many succesful commercial products make the user even know what a database schema is, or that it exists? 

Could you watch TV at all if your TV set needed to make NBC, CBS, ESPN update all their software for you to see anything?

Exposing the schema to the user in this way is the _opposite_ of software architecture and usability.

Fail. Again.
Consider installing MythTV using Mythbuntu Control Panel (https://www.mythtv.org/wiki/Mythbuntu_Control_Panel) with the Mythbuntu MythTV Updates PPA.
I've been using Mythtv for 9 years from a backend a a few frontends. It is not for a novice, setting up can be tricky but well worth the effort.

Tried usin synaptec, maybe all good w/ ubuntu soft (?) (an ya, been usin Linux sincw 91/92 w/ 0.98 or v0.99 kernel.. (and ~35 "floppies" - 3.5" to DL) I just luv playin w' the soft, so almost filled 7TB after my 7'th+ install in 2 months.. just a bit rusty after a couple yrs off on disability. Update when i try again.  ;) And.. What's w Nick - "eh... all works great, so guess I'll give it 2 stars"??) I think Brad has the idea.. but I'm too busy right now writing the AI to save the world. ;)
summary: 1,5 hrs.. try dif way another time

description: PITA to set up as a novice but worth the aggro IMHO. With each release it gets easier to set up. Install it on a LTS system and you should only have to do it every few years.
summary: Once installed and configured, it's the best there is

description: MEssed up my machine and cant remove - unmet dependencies - straight after installing!
Die Software crashte mein Ubuntu, sie startete sich ständig neu, bitte nicht installieren ansonsten Datenverlust!
Achtung ich hatte es versehentlich installiert und bekomme es nicht mehr gelöscht ,was nun wie bekomme ich es wider los ?
summary: Achtung ich hatte es versehentlich installiert

description:
I can't unterstand some of the critical votings. As a newbie to MythTV I installed V32 from official repository sources with apt and after a smooth setup in 30 min. it was running completely error free.

Th only hard work was initial DVB-S channel scanning, which didn't get any channels first. 

But now all works fine, only little bugs in mythTV frontend.
DANGER: application propriétaire intrusive et impossible à désinstaller. Elle m'a pourri mon ordi. NE SURTOUT PAS INSTALLER!
Ne fonctionne pas et impossible à désinstaller sous Ubuntu 18.04
ne pas installer bloque l'ordi et reviens a chaque fois
summary: ne pas installer bloque l'ordi et reviens a chaque fois
Il faut utiliser synapic pour le désinstaler
